name: Altina Sparkling Can Taster Pack
description: ALTINA Can Taster Pack - The Perfect Introduction to our Collection. The perfect taste of botanically built non-alc wines from ALTINA. La Vie En Rose - Crisp Rose Bubbles The perfect blend of delicate Pink Rose Petals and the subtle tang of Hibiscus Flowers.

name: AVEC FlowState Mixed 6 bottles
description: Discover the full FLOWSTATE experience with our Mixed Box: three bottles of Shiraz and three bottles of Mango Spritzer. Each varietal begins with a carefully crafted wine base, gently de-alcoholised, and layered with botanicals for depth and balance.

name: AVEC FlowState Shiraz (6 bottles)
description: FLOWSTATE Shiraz begins with a full-bodied wine base, gently de-alcoholised, and layered with botanicals for depth and balance. Our FLOWSTATE™ blend of L-theanine and magnesium supports clarity and calm, helping you stay present and unwind.

name: AVEC FlowState Mango Spritzer (6 bottles)
description: FLOWSTATE Mango Spritzer begins with a crisp wine base, gently de-alcoholised, and lifted with juicy tropical mango and sparkling bubbles for a refreshing twist. Our FLOWSTATE™ blend of L-theanine and magnesium supports clarity and calm, helping you stay present and unwind.

name: Altina Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc (6 bottles)
description: ALTINA Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc wine and Native Australian Finger Lime. Bright aroma of white nectarine and fresh cucumber. A crisp, lingering finish underpinned with herbaceous notes.

name: Altina Kakadu Plum Rose (6 bottles)
description: ALTINA Kakadu Plum Rosé The perfect Rosé blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc, Shiraz and Native Australian Kakadu Plum. A refreshing bouquet of just-ripe strawberry and subtle pink rose. A crisp, dry finish, with a hint of spice.

name: Altina Pepperberry Shiraz (6 bottles)
description: ALTINA Pepperberry Shiraz The perfect Shiraz blend of premium de-alcoholised Shiraz and Native Australian Pepperberry. Bursting with juicy red fruits and a hint of dark chocolate. A dry, smooth finish, with notes of vanilla and layered lingering spice.

name: Altina Sparkling Brut (6 bottles)
description: ALTINA Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Brut, crafted in the style of Sparkling Non Alcoholic Chardonnay, presents top notes of Native Australian Peach and strawberry. Bright acidity and toasty vanilla undertones complement the experience. Pop the cork and celebrate with this delicious alcohol-free alternative. Premium de-alcoholised wine infused with health-giving botanicals for a delightful non-alcoholic experience.

name: Altina Sparkling Sansgria (6 bottles)
description: ALTINA Sparkling Sansgria is crafted in the style of a Non-alcoholic Sangria. It's a lush and vibrant style of bubbles with a stunning red colour. Rich dark fruits including native Australian Riberry are balanced with sweet Orange, soft vanilla and spicy notes.

name: Altina Mixed Still Wine Bottles (6 bottes)
description: Mixed Still Wine Bottles - The Liberate Collection The perfect collection of botanically built non alc still wines from ALTINA. Everything you need to for your next dinner party.

name: Altina Mixed Sparkling Bottles (6 Bottles)
description: Experience a delightful trio of ALTINA's Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Wines. This mixed pack includes the vibrant Sparkling Rosé with notes of bright crunchy fruit and tart native Rosella, the elegant Sparkling Brut echoing top notes of Native Australian Peach and strawberry, and the refreshing Sparkling Sangria bursting with red berries and citrus. Perfect for celebrations, this mixed pack offers a variety of flavours and aromas, providing a unique and enjoyable non-alcoholic wine experience.

name: Altina Mixed Sparkling Cans (24 cans)
description: Mixed Cans - The Complete Collection The perfect collection of botanically built non-alc wines from ALTINA. Everything you need to for your next picnic or BBQ. La Vie En Rose - Crisp Rose Bubbles The perfect blend of delicate Pink Rose Petals and the subtle tang of Hibiscus Flowers.

name: Altina Le Blanc (24 cans)
description: Altina Le Blanc - Elegant White Bubbles Altina Le Blanc is a non-alcoholic sparkling wine built from natural ingredients and native Australian botanicals. Each ingredient is carefully chosen and expertly blended. The tasting experience is nuanced and layered. Delicious flavours build in complexity as you sip.

name: Altina La Vie En Rose (24 cans)
description: Altina La Vie En Rose - Crisp Rose bubbles Altina La Vie En Rose is a non-alcoholic sparkling wine alternative built from natural ingredients and native Australian botanicals. Each ingredient is carefully chosen and expertly blended. The tasting experience is nuanced and layered.

name: Altina 3 Bottle Gift Box (Still or Sparkling)
description: No description available

name: Sparkling Bottle Stopper
description: The perfect solution to keep your bubbles fresh longer - meet our high-quality brushed stainless steel Bottle Stopper. To use, push stopper down into place; this self-sealing stopper creates an airtight seal, allowing for horizontal storage. To release, simply press the button and remove. Handwash only.

name: Giant Silicone Ice Cube Tray Add On
description: Make your drinks a bit fancier with our giant cube silicone ice cube trays. Freeze your wines into ice cubes so they don't get diluted, or make fancy ice cubes like in our Virgin Mimosa.

name: The Altina Taster Collection
description: The best way to sample all of ALTINA's delicious non alcoholic wines, non alc. beer and wine alternatives. This bundle contains our still wines: Finger Lime Sauvignon Blanc and Pepperberry Shiraz; our 3 sparkling wines: Sparkling Brut, Sparkling Rose and Sangria; plus our Le Blanc and Sansgria wine alternatives (in cans). Looking for the best value non alcoholic taster pack? This is it! All of our drinks contain no added sugars, are low in calories, are vegan, and of course made in Australia by our small family run business.

name: Altina Sparkling Rosé (6 Bottles)
description: Indulge in ALTINA Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Rosé, a delightful blend with layered notes of bright crunchy fruit, tart native Rosella, and a hint of citrus. Experience crisp, lively bubbles with a dry finish. Pop the cork and celebrate with this alcohol-free alternative. Crafted from premium Australian wine, expertly de-alcoholised and infused with health-giving botanicals. Elevate your celebrations with this alcohol-free Sparkling Rosé.

name: AVEC FlowState Ritual Kit
description: Turn your glass of AVEC into a ritual. Our Flowstate Ritual Kit includes a silky eye mask, a soothing essential oil roller, and a curated playlist + meditation card — all tucked inside a reusable gift bag. A little luxury to help you slow down, sip mindfully, and savour the moment.
